author: Shiva Chandra
comment: @developers How to get values for a sensor (e.g. accelerometer) on mobile? I am developing an app that has to access accelerometer data once it is received from wear

author: Anurag Chitnis
comment: Excellent application! We need to install the application separately on phone and wearable when running from the android studio. I faced this issue as a beginner with wearable app development.
How do i collect the sensor from the wearable? I have sync my android app to wearable but nothing is showing up on the app.

comment: A good logging device for watch sensor activities.
title: Exactly what I am looking for.
